title: Executive Order 6072-Transfer of Control and Jurisdiction of Certain Buildings at Cristobal to the Navy Department, Canal Zone
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by law, it is hereby ordered that Buildings Nos. 1113, 1409, and 1411, located at Cristobal, Canal Zone, that were transferred, exclusive of the sites thereof but including free use of such sites, by Executive Order No. 3917, dated October 16, 1923, from the Panama Canal to the War Department, be, and the same are hereby, transferred under like conditions to the Navy Department.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6072-Transfer of Control and Jurisdiction of Certain Buildings at Cristobal to the Navy Department, Canal Zone Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361907
